item.title: My Sql Server Notes
item.description: I tried to summarize some of the techniques that I use in my development of systems that I do in my work. Some of them may be repetitive work, so I don’t forget to write them down Rename Column EXEC sp_rename 'dbo.table_name.old_column', 'new_colum', 'COLUMN'; Formatting Money Value REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR,money,0), '.',',') Limit and Offset SELECT [id] ,[name] FROM [log] ORDER BY [id] ,[name] OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY;
